The development was the latest step forward under the U.S.-brokered

articles.title: Ukraine says it has hit a major Russian oil refinery with long-range drones
articles.description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Ukrainian drones struck a major oil refinery in Russia’s Volgograd region for the second time in almost three months, Ukraine’s general staff said Thursday. Russian officials did not confirm the attack, although the local governor said drones started a fire at an unspecified ind

articles.title: The Louvre urged to speed up security upgrades in audit conducted before the heist
articles.description: France’s court of auditors urged the Louvre museum to speed up its security modernization plans as a priority, in a report conducted before the Oct. 19 jewels heist that noted major delays in the renovation of the world’s most-visited museum. articles.title: ‘New reality’: Hurricane Melissa strength multiplied by climate crisis, study says
articles.description: Winds of Melissa’s strength are now five times more frequent due to the climate crisis, research saysEvery aspect of Hurricane Melissa, the most powerful storm ever to hit Jamaica, was worsened by the climate crisis, a team of scientists has found.Melissa caused widespread devastation when it crunch

articles.title: Ugandans view Mamdani’s NYC win as a ‘beacon of hope’ amid democratic struggle
articles.description: Ugandans react with joy after Kampala-born Mamdani’s victory during a trying time for democracy in east AfricaUgandans reacted with joy and hope to the news that Kampala-born Zohran Mamdani had been elected mayor of New York City, amid a stormy democratic and rights environment in east Africa.Mamdan

articles.title: Anker-backed hybrid RV startup Evotrex comes out of stealth
articles.description: Evotrex joins startups like Lightship, Pebble, and Grounded in trying to disrupt the RV market, which is skewing younger.

articles.title: A new equation may explain the Universe without dark matter
articles.description: A new theory claims dark matter and dark energy don’t exist — they’re just side effects of the universe’s changing forces. By rethinking gravity and cosmic timelines, it could rewrite our understanding of space and time itself.

articles.title: Colossal stars forged the Universe’s earliest clusters
articles.description: A team of astrophysicists has unveiled how colossal stars thousands of times more massive than the Sun shaped the earliest star clusters and galaxies. These short-lived giants not only forged the strange chemical fingerprints found in ancient globular clusters but may also have been the seeds of the

articles.title: Canadian Forces sent to Jamaica as hurricane relief efforts ramp up
articles.description: Hurricane Melissa, a Category 5 storm, hit Jamaica on Oct. 28, leaving significant damage and killing at least 32 people.

articles.title: Ottawa cyclists, councillors frustrated as Ontario bill targets bike lanes
articles.description: Bill 60 is currently in second reading in the legislature, but the Ford government introduced a motion on Wednesday to fast-track the omnibus bill that would bypass committee hearings entirely.

articles.title: From flu outbreak to ‘Ostrichfest’ to high court, how B.C. ostrich cull saga unfolded
articles.description: EDGEWOOD, BRITISH COLUMBIA, CANADA — Universal Ostrich Farms in Edgewood, B.C., has spent more than 10 months opposing a cull order from the Canadian Food Inspection Agency that would result in the deaths of hundreds of its birds. articles.title: I used to be in favour of Lansdowne 2.0. I've changed my mind
articles.description: Bruce Deachman: I don’t want Lansdowne to fail, but I also don't trust this deal. City council should vote 'no.'

articles.title: CFIA says ostrich cull will go ahead after high court decides it won’t hear appeal
articles.description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency says it will move forward with “complete depopulation” of hundreds of ostriches at a British Columbia farm after the owners lost a bid to have their case heard by the Supreme Court of Canada.
